page.title: 17RELIGION IN COUNTESTHORPE
page.content: In Countestorpe there are 3 churches: St Andrews (Church of England) Countesthorpe Methodist Countesthorpe Baptist All 3 churches have both morning and evening services. There are activities going on thoughout the week at all of the churches such as dance classes,youth clubs and a mothers union. Some of these are organised by church members like prayer meetings and some of the other groups just hire out the church. For Catholics the nearest church is St Mary's Catholic church in South Wigston.This is the same with the other denominations some you have to go right into Leicester to worship. Out of 43 children we surveyed 11 went to church. {
